root.name: Kick Challenger: Air Foot
root.description: OverviewKick Challenger: Air Foot is a game that requires the player control the two feet of its vegetable protagonist independently, using different sections of the controller. The goal is to stride through the vertically scrolling stages, kicking enemies and obstacles to destroy them. Occasionally, the player character can find additional types of shoes to wear, including what resemble Nike brand sneakers.Each stage ends with a boss that must be kicked repeatedly in their weak spot before they are defeated.
